snippet: Israeli airstrikes that began on Friday afternoon killed more Palestinian militants and militant groups fired scores of rockets into southern Israel.
abstract: Cross-border violence between Israel and militant groups in Gaza continues as Israeli airstrikes kill several more Palestinian militants, and militant groups fire scores of rockets into southern Israel, breaking months of relative calm; Israeli military says that it is not seeking an escalation of violence in the region, but that it will act forcefully to protect Israeli citizens.

byline.original: By FARES AKRAM and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Fares Akram reported from Gaza, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Israeli airstrikes that began on Friday afternoon killed more Palestinian militants and militant groups fired scores of rockets into southern Israel.

headline.main: Violence Continues for Israel and Militants
headline.print_headline: Violence Continues For Israel And Militants
